com.compendium.ui
Class UIHistory

java.lang.Object
  com.compendium.ui.UIHistory

public class UIHistory
extends java.lang.Object

Holds a list of all views visited

Author:
Michelle Bachler

Field Summary
private  int currentIndex
          The current index position within the history list.
private  boolean goneBack
          Has the user just gone back in the history list?
private  boolean goneForward
          Has the user just gone forward in the history list?
private  boolean jumped
          Has the user just jumped to a position in the history list?
private  int limit
          The current limit on the number of Views held in the history list.
private  java.util.Vector vtHistory
          Holds a list of View instances of the views opened so far.

goToHistoryItem

public boolean goToHistoryItem(int index)
Return whether it is possible to go the the given history index position

Returns:
index, the index position to test for.

goForward

public View goForward()
This method returns the next object in the history. If the current object displayed is the last object in the history or if the history is empty then null is returned.

Returns:
com.compendium.core.datamodel.View, the next item in the history from the current position.

goBack

public View goBack()
This method returns the previous object in the History. If this is the first object in the History, then null is returned.

Returns:
com.compendium.core.datamodel.View, the previous item in the history to the current position.
